titleInfo.title: Grand Ole Opry - Royal Crown Cola - 1947-12-13 - Excerpts 2

mods.abstract: Excerpts from a Royal Crown Cola sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment (9:00-9:30 pm) from December 13, 1947. Featuring Louie Buck (host), and performers Roy Acuff and his Smoky Mountain Boys, Pap's Jug Band, and Curly Fox. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
